src_original: 12 tac cānupalaṃbhayogena. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya mahāyānaṃ yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇi. catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ  13 aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ /  idam api subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya mahāyānaṃ tac cānupalaṃbhayogena /
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩摩訶衍，謂四禪、四無色定、四等心、八脫門、未曾所獲味之定，是謂須菩提菩薩摩訶薩摩訶衍也。 有所得者亦無所得、亦無所獲。
